profile:
At Reliance Yanch, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.


Reliance Yanch Home Comfort is able to provide a wide variety and depth to our range of HVAC services. We have become the leading source for heating, air conditioning and home comfort systems in Central Ontario including Simcoe County, southern Georgian Bay and the Muskokas. Our mission is to be the leading service and Installation Company in residential heating and air conditioning. 
From our locations in Barrie and Collingwood, we offer a full range of home comfort equipment and services, from design and installation to service and repair. We are specialists in the replacement of residential heating, air conditioning and domestic hot water systems including natural gas, electric, propane and geothermal systems.

Furnaces, Air Conditioners, Water Heaters, Air Purifiers, Boilers, Humidifiers, Ductless Air Conditioners 
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
The Plumbing Expert Mechanical Services, Inc. is pleased to offer Plumbing, Filtration and Drain services around the GTA. An honest plumbing company based on a good reputation. What we offer is plumbers! Not technicians! We have over 14 years of experience and service to the Greater Toronto area and know what it takes get the job done right in the most cost effective way possible. We live in your neighborhood and understand your needs. We are a proud Canadian owned and operated which keeps us grounded and accountable. To earn your trust, we fix the problem the first time. We take pride in all our work including: 
• Low water pressure 
• Household Leaks 
• Appliance Installation
• Plumbing Fixtures Repair & Installation
• Sewage & Sump Pumps 
• Drain Cleaning & Repairs 
• Water Quality & Filtration systems
• Water Conservation 
• Custom homes 
• Renovation 
• Remodelling 
• Roughing in

profile:
Quinn Water Systems is the leading water treatment and purification company in Ontario. 
Founded in 2019, Quinn's innovative approach to water has been a game-changer for many Canadian households.
You can always contact us 24/7 for you enquiries or ask for services.
We are based in Richmond Hill, On and willing to travel any location in Ontario. 

Our Services:
· We service and install all kinds of Water Purification and Water Filtration Systems: Water Softeners, Water Filters, Reverse Osmosis, UV Light.. for houses, cottage and commercial projects in all Ontario locations including:
- Inspect and Install Water Systems
- Control Valve programming
- Control Valve head rebuild or replacement. 
- Media Change, including carbon and resin.
- Filter Change, cleaning and disinfecting reverse osmosis and multi stage under sink systems...
· Top brands choice: Clack, Kinetico, Pentair...
· Plumbing and Renovating services from licensed plumbers

------------------
24/7 Service all Ontario. No- Obligation In Home Consultation
All performed under COVID-19 guidelines!
·  No monthly bills.
·. Every process is transparent.

TREAT YOURSELF TODAY! GET PROFESSIONALLY TREATED WATER AT EVERY TAP!
